title: raised back of hand: medium-light skin tone

adjectives: Increased, particularly above a normal level.
verbs: Raise the level or amount of something
nouns: A return made with the back of the hand facing the direction of the stroke
The backhand is a tennis shot in which one swings the racquet around one's body with the back of the hand preceding the palm.
A stroke made across the chest from the off-hand side to the racquet hand side; a stroke during which the back of the hand faces the shot.

description: This version of the  Raised Back of Hand emoji has the  Medium-light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Cream White Skin Tone on
apple_vendor_description: The raised back of hand emoji on Apple devices, shown here with a medium-light skin tone, features a hand held up with the palm facing away, fingers extended. Apple's signature smooth gradients and subtle highlights give this emoji a polished and distinct appearance, conveying a sense of stopping, pausing, or a gentle 'hold on.' The soft, rounded edges of the fingers and the clean lines of the hand make it a versatile symbol for requesting a moment, signaling a halt, or politely indicating a boundary in digital communication across Apple devices.
